title: UN supervision mission founds 13 bodies in eastern Syria
description: DAMASCUS， May 30 (Xinhua) -- The UN supervision mission in Syria reported Wednesday that 13 bodies were discovered Tuesday overnight near the eastern province of Deir al-Zour， the mission's spokeswoman said in a statement emailed to Xinhua Wednesday.
cleanContent: DAMASCUS, May 30 (Xinhua) -- The UN supervision mission in Syria reported Wednesday that 13 bodies were discovered Tuesday overnight near the eastern province of Deir al-Zour, the mission's spokeswoman said in a statement emailed to Xinhua Wednesday.The 13 bodies were discovered last night in the area of Assukar, 50 km east of Deir al-Zour, said Sausan Ghosheh, adding that all the bodies had their hands tied behind their backs, and some appeared to have been shot in the head from a short distance.Ghosheh said head of UN observers Maj. Gen. Robert Mood is " deeply disturbed by this appalling and inexcusable act."Mood called on all parties to exercise restraint and end the cycle of violence for the sake of Syria and the Syrian people, Ghosheh said.The recent incidents added to the pressures ahead of the UN mission and the peace plan brokered by UN, Arab League joint envoy to Syria Kofi Annan.																																																																								|  |
